price: 19. (Waxaa lagu odhan) Cuna oo cabba si bogaadin leh. Waa abaalka waxaad fali jirteen (oo wanaag ah).
arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kulū wa-ish'rabū hanīan bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
